backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user registration, role assignment, and one‑time superadmin claiming with access‑control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes for InternalLogin superadmin claim behavior, readiness checks, and related tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object summarizing all frontend file purposes, including routing pages and dashboards.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app handling manual route switching via window history and rendering pages accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with access‑control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook checking whether the user can create tasks through actor.canCreateTaskUI().
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page showing disabled login options and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with inputs for personal and company details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard with header and a static message block.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Assistant dashboard displaying a thank‑you message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard showing a conditional 'Create Task' button based on query state.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard with a static appreciation message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard presenting a financial stability message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard showing a motivational responsibility message.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard with a control‑focused message.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal landing page providing login and registration links for internal users.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page handling Internet Identity login, role extraction, superadmin claim checks, and navigation to role-specific dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and role selection.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client and partner login/register links with branding and footer.
Partner login page with disabled login buttons and links to registration and home.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Partner registration form collecting personal info, skills, and location.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, frontend constraints, backend scope, and known issues blocking build. Documents architectural rules, existing features, and required backend fixes for the next request.
